Hairbrush with a built-in massager: This hairbrush can include a small vibrating massager on the back for a more relaxing and comfortable brushing experience.
Hairbrush with a built-in hairdryer: This hairbrush can be designed to work in tandem with a hairdryer, allowing users to dry their hair while brushing, saving time and effort.

Hairbrush with a built-in hair color applicator: This hairbrush can be designed to hold a small amount of hair color and apply it evenly throughout the hair while brushing, making the coloring process more efficient and less messy.
Hairbrush with a built-in mirror: This hairbrush can have a small mirror built into the handle, allowing users to see their hair while brushing, making it easier to style and maintain their hair.
Hairbrush with a built-in LED light: This hairbrush can include an LED light that can help illuminate the hair, making it easier to see and style the hair, especially in low-light conditions.
